Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Lovable \Lov"a*ble\, a. Having qualities that excite, or are fitted to excite, love; worthy of love. [1913 Webster]
Elaine the fair, Elaine the lovable, Elaine, the lily maid of Astolat. --Tennyson. [1913 Webster]
lovable adj : having characteristics that attract love or affection; "a mischievous but lovable child" [syn: {loveable}] [ant: {hateful}]
